title: Scavenger runt

properties.value: Scavenger runts were monsters found in the Chambers of Xeric. They could be found in ruins and drop various items needed for puzzles and materials for skilling. Compared to scavenger beasts, they dealt less damage and had fewer hitpoints, but they dropped two items when killed as opposed to three.

content:
Scavenger runt was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.

Monster IDremoved

Scavenger runts were monsters found in the Chambers of Xeric. They could be found in ruins and drop various items needed for puzzles and materials for skilling. Compared to scavenger beasts, they dealt less damage and had fewer hitpoints, but they dropped two items when killed as opposed to three.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Tools
    • 1.3 Materials
  • 2 Changes

Drops[edit | edit source]

Scavenger runts dropped two items at a time.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 January 2019
(update)

Following a balance update, scavenger runts were removed and replaced with their bigger versions in all scavenger rooms.
